Enable.name: Enable Task
Enable.help:
Join this task to scheduler.
Task commission, research, reward are force to enable.

NextRun.name: Next Run
NextRun.help:
Updated automatically after completing the task to set next scheduled run, typically not manually modified
However you can force immediate scheduling if you clear this text field

ServerUpdate.name: Server Update
ServerUpdate.help: Series of server refresh time(s) as to when this task will next run, this is automatically converted to respective time zone, generally do not need to modify

Serial.name: Serial
Serial.help:
Common emulator Serial can be queried in the list below
Use "auto" to auto-detect emulators, but if multiple emulators are running or use emulators that do not support auto-detect, "auto" cannot be used and serial must be filled in manually
Default serial for select emulators:
- BlueStacks 127.0.0.1:5555
- BlueStacks4 Hyper-V use "bluestacks4-hyperv", "bluestacks4-hyperv-2" for multi instance, and so on
- BlueStacks5 Hyper-V use "bluestacks5-hyperv", "bluestacks5-hyperv-1" for multi instance, and so on
- NoxPlayer 127.0.0.1:62001
- NoxPlayer64bit 127.0.0.1:59865
- MuMuPlayer/MuMuPlayer X 127.0.0.1:7555
- MuMuPlayer12 127.0.0.1:16384
- MemuPlayer 127.0.0.1:21503
- LDPlayer emulator-5554 or 127.0.0.1:5555
- WSA use "wsa-0" to make the game run in the background, which needs to be controlled or closed by third-party software
If there are multiple emulator instances running, the default is reserved for one of them and the others will use different serials to avoid conflicts
Open console.bat and run `adb devices` to find them or follow the emulator's official tutorial

PackageName.name: Game Server
PackageName.help: Manual select is required if multiple game clients are installed on emulator

ScreenshotMethod.name: Screenshot Method
ScreenshotMethod.help:
When using auto-select, a benchmark will be performed and automatically changed to the fastest screenshot method.
General speed: DroidCast_raw >> aScreenCap_nc > ADB_nc >>> aScreenCap > uiautomator2 ~= ADB.
Run Tools - Performance Test to find the fastest method.

ControlMethod.name: Control Method
ControlMethod.help:
Speed: MaaTouch = minitouch >>> uiautomator2 ~= ADB
MaaTouch is recommended

AdbRestart.name: Try to restart adb when no device found

_info.name: Emulator Settings
_info.help: The following values are auto-filled according to "Serial", if you donâ€™t understand, please don't modify them

SaveError.name: Record Exception
SaveError.help: Records exception and log into directory for review or sharing

ScreenshotLength.name: Record Screenshot(s)
ScreenshotLength.help: Number of screenshots saved when exception occurs

OnePushConfig.name: Error notify config
OnePushConfig.help:
When Alas cannot handle exception, send a message through Onepush. Configuration document: 
https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/Onepush-configuration-%5BEN%5D

ScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s)
ScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 0.3, can help reduce CPU on high-end PCs

CombatScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s) In Combat
CombatScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 1.0, can help reduce CPU during battle

WhenTaskQueueEmpty.name: When Task Queue is Empty
WhenTaskQueueEmpty.help: Close AL when there are no pending tasks, can help reduce CPU

_info.name: Dungeon Settings
_info.help: Brush a dungeon until trailblaze power runs out

Use.name: Use Friend Support
Use.when_daily: Use Only When Required by Dailies

Character.name: Support Character
Character.help: Select a friend support character, if not found, select the default (first) role

_info.name: Achievable Quests
_info.help:
When the task status is "Not Set", you need to configure the SRC as required to achieve the quest
Note: Please keep more tasks in "Achievable" status, otherwise SRC may not be able to grind 500 activity

Clear_Calyx_Golden_1_times.name: Clear Calyx (Golden) 1 time(s)
Clear_Calyx_Golden_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

Clear_Stagnant_Shadow_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

Clear_Cavern_of_Corrosion_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

In_a_single_battle_inflict_3_Weakness_Br.name: In a single battle, inflict 3 Weakness Break of different Types

Enter_combat_by_attacking_enemy_Weakness.name: Enter combat by attacking enemy's Weakness and win 3 times

Use_Technique_2_times.name: Use Technique 2 times
Use_Technique_2_times.help: Achievable by default, will go to the abyssal 1 and use technique twice

Go_on_assignment_1_time.name: Go on assignment 1 time
Go_on_assignment_1_time.help: Need to configure and enable the "Assignment" task

Complete_1_stage_in_Simulated_Universe_A.name: Complete 1 stage in Simulated Universe (Any world)

Obtain_victory_in_combat_with_support_ch.name: Obtain victory in combat with support characters 1 time
Obtain_victory_in_combat_with_support_ch.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task, configure support settings also

Use_an_Ultimate_to_deal_the_final_blow_1.name: Use an Ultimate to deal the final blow 1 time

Level_up_any_Light_Cone_1_time.name: Level up any Light Cone 1 time

Salvage_any_Relic.name: Salvage any Relic
Salvage_any_Relic.help: Achievable by default, will salvage the first one in reverse order of rarity

Synthesize_Consumable_1_time.name: Synthesize Consumable 1 time
Synthesize_Consumable_1_time.help: Achievable by default, will synthesize low-rarity snacks

Synthesize_material_1_time.name: Synthesize material 1 time
Synthesize_material_1_time.help: Achievable by default, will synthesize low-rarity material

Use_Consumables_1_time.name: Use Consumables 1 time
Use_Consumables_1_time.help: Achievable by default, will use gear. If there is no material, synthesized before use

_info.name: Assignment Settings

Claim rewards and dispatch, handling specified assignments first
If the assignment limit is not reached after that, others will be dispatched according to preset priority (EXP Materials/Credits â†’ Character Materials â†’ Synthesis Materials)
